column4: hey i got a little issue i installed the amsn and then i tried to install a skin the amsn web page told me that i needed to copy the folder i donwloaded into /usr/share/amsn/skin but when i try to do that it tells me that i dont have the permision to copy that folder into that file can anyone help me with hat?
did you try using sudo to copy?
whatever command you're using to copy just put "sudo" in front of it in the terminal window.  Then enter your password.
